advertisement banner Favorite this location
Express Lanes Schedule WSDOT uses express lanes to assist the flow of traffic during busy travel times. These lanes are scheduled to move in the direction that will relieve the most congestion from the transportation system. We operate the lanes on a typical daily schedule that changes on the weekends and occasionally for major events.
New favorite location OK Cancel Alerts in This Area Map Legend
My Routes New Route Settings drag and drop to rearrange Create a new route MyGoodToGo.com Best Times To Travel Express Lanes Happening Now News Releases Rename favorite location
My Routes
Create custom routes by using your phone\'s GPS. Once created, easily check for alerts and let the WSDOT app automatically add cameras, travel times, pass reports and ferry schedules on your route to your favorites. Creating a New Route 1. Tap \"Start Tracking\" on the New Route screen. \n2. Make your way along the route you want to save. \n3. When you arrive at your destination, tap \"Finish\" to save your new route. Tap the plus button to get started Set your device down and make your way along your route. Tap Finish when you\'ve arrived at your destination.
